Posts.Content: Hi Hally I had a lumpectomy and the sentinal node removed  .the node and margins were all clear so i am told.It was a low grade tubular.Had my first lot session of rads yesterday and going back for the second in about a half hour. I'm having 15 in all
Posts.Title: anyone out there diagnosed with tubular cancer?

Posts.Content: Hi  just joined this forum  and saw your post. I was diagnosed with tubular BC in March  Now waiting for my 1st radio treatment on the 8th May
